articles.author: Zia Weise, Sara Schonhardt
articles.title: Eye-catching climate donations put spotlight on China at COP climate talks - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The oil-rich UAE aimed to slough off criticism about its role leading the U.N. climate talks with a $100 million pledge to aid poorer, climate-stricken countries.
